Daniel McKorley (amụrụ na 17th June, 1971) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye guzobere, onyeisi oche, na Chief Executive Officer nke McDan Group of Companies. E nyere McKorley aha onye ọchụnta ego nke Afọ (2016) na Ghana Aviation Awards

Daniel McKorley mụrụ na La, Accra.  Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Mahadum Ghana mana ọ kwụsịrị, n'enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ akwụkwọ.  Ọ nwere ike ịdebanye aha naanị maka ogo 15 afọ ka e mesịrị.. McKorley nwere diplọma na Leadership na Mahadum Lehigh, Pennsylvania

Ọ gụsịrị BSc na EMBA ya na Business Administration na Entrepreneurship site na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration (GIMPA) na nzere doctorate nke London Business School nyere. O nwere ọtụtụ asambodo post-graduate na azụmaahịa, idu ndú, njem, na nhazi, n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ agụmakwụkwọ rụzuru.

Daniel McKorley bụ Chief Executive Officer (CEO) nke McDan Group of Companies. O hiwere Ụlọ ọrụ Mbupu McDan na Nọvemba 1999, ugbu a nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Accra na alaka dị na Tema na Takoradi.  Companylọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ọnụnọ n'ihe karịrị ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri 2000 na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri zuru ụwa ọnụ n'ihi mmekorita ya na Universal Freight Organisation, Cross Trades, na World Cargo Alliance (WCA).

McKorley gosipụtara Benz Bus (Sprinter) nwere ikuku oyi na Ghana Tennis Federation na McDan Tennis Open West African Championship na Accra Stadium na Mee 2017. Daniel McKorley nyere ego GH¢10,000 na Sports Writers Association of Ghana (SWAG) iji kwado 2017 SWAG Night Awards na Banquet Hall nke State House.
Na Septemba 2021, ọ kwadoro Psalm Adjeteyfio na GH¢5,000 iji nyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri aka.

McKorley lụrụ Abigail McKorley na Roberta McKorley ma ha nwere ụmụ. Ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Accra mara Daniel McKorley ikpe maka nlelị.  A mara ya ikpe mgbe ụlọikpe kwuchara na ọ kpachaara anya nupụ isi n'iwu Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu n'ihi ala a na-ese okwu na East Legon, ma nye ya iwu ka ọ kwụọ nra nke GH¢40,000..
